product_name: New Balance NX950 GPS Runner Fitness Monitor
long_description: The New Balance NX950 GPS Runner fitness monitor accurately tracks your speed and distance via GPS and provides all the key data you need to inform your workouts and competitions. Sensitive GPS technology precisely monitors speed and distance. Workout mode features 100 hr. range, 1/100-second resolution, 99 laps/splits, run and lap data recall and running/cycling profiles. Display presets include clock, calories burned, distance, pace, average pace, speed, average speed, workout timer, lap number, lap time and lap distance. Auto-lap function automatically takes a lap at a user-defined distance. Interval timer mode provides six interval timers, time or distance settings, repeat intervals, 1 - 99 times or continuous, visual and audible alerts and comprehensive memory. The New Balance NX950 GPS Runner fitness monitor features 12-hr. battery life with GPS activated, metric/imperial display, backlight, 50m (165 ft.) water resistance. Includes rechargeable battery and USB charging cable.
short_description: The New Balance NX950 GPS Runner fitness monitor accurately tracks your speed and distance via GPS and provides all the key data you need to inform your workouts and competitions.
